data.actual_result: The sound of the VLC I'm sharing cuts in and out or even can't be heard
data.expected_result: Share a window and sound to who I'm calling while being able to talk with mics
data.short_description: When screensharing audio via VLC or Window's Media Player, the sound cuts out after a few seconds.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into call with someone - Screenshare VLC with sound
